item.title: Learn the basics of GraphQL+-, now available on video
item.description: Dgraph has its own custom query language based on GraphQL, called GraphQL+-. You can learn about the basics of GraphQL+- in our latest screencast that introduces you to writing queries in it, which can be found right below.
